Recommendations: It is encouraged that in every student activity, there has to be documentations, and if possible some may be posted on bulletin boards.
It is suggested that some important student forms be filled out with complete data.
It would be better if documents which need signatures be signed for authenticity.
Substantiate each benchmark statement with required documents.
Legality wise, licenses of the medical officers of the University have to be renewed.
The Guidance Counselor  is enjoined to obtain her Mastera! degree for advancement.
There has to be a concrete program for safety and security of the MMSU community.
Hiring of additional licensed Guidance Counselor is a necessity to meet with the ratio of one (1) Guidance Counselor for every 1000 students.
